column5: Hello i am new to the board.Im usually NMFOldSoul567 but that will become so when i figure out how to change my automatic Username.I have a fair share of fishing knowledge tips and tricks and am looking to advise/educate share with people in my free time.Just as well as learn a thing or two here and there.
Hi FFA, welcome aboard  Can we just ask questions to you in this thread instead of PMing you?
